trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Blue Bell
There were no other sightings in Blue Bell on or around November 16th 2008
divs: sighting detailsduring this same week, not certain which day, i left fort washington, pa driving to norristown, pa. via rt.73 at about 6 pm. while driving west, i noticed the lights in the w-nw sky. they appeared to be coming from above the relatively low cloud cover. the lights, four of them, were repeating in a somewhat circular\elongated pattern, converging at a 'central point', then departing that point emanating outward at approximately 90��� angles from the central point. when at their 'outermost' location from center, the 'beams' had an elongated pattern on the clouds above. i turned off route 73 and began winding via side-streets and roads toward the lights. as i began to approach the location of the convergent overhead lights, i was able to see that the lights had a terrestrial origin. i was able to see the 'light beam' emanating from ground level. i continued to follow the apparent source and soon found that they were coming from normandy farms, a local hotel\restaurant in blue bell, pa. there was much traffic into and out of the facility and i assume that something 'special' was occurring. i am not certain what the event was.
